title: Need a help
content: Guys,It is taking a long year for the first year to start.Can anyone share any material,syllabus and reference books for the first year. So that I can start preparation from now. I m planning to join eee through kcet.

comments.body: Bro chill out , don't take too much tension and all man , cause after clg starts you ain't gonna have a lot of free time and stuff so enjoy it while it lasts .
No bro I know that was just planning to work atleast 1 hr a day
Before I was enjoying but now it became a bit boring
Thank for the site lingon berry own,and is there python in the first year. And the notes in this are relevant right.
First year doesn't require much prep , after the classes start just listen to them carefully and study 1 week before internals , you are good to go
Brother but the thing is mostly I will get ece in pes ec campus or eee in pesu rr. so I wish to atleast change my branch to pesu ec campus cs aiml
when do you think the classes will start??
go visit [www.edx.org](http://www.edx.org)  Edx has loads of courses from pretty good colleges, i am doing cs50 for fun rn.
RVCE folk said first week of september, pes could decide to dump kcet kids and just start directly
Ok bro I will look into it
